title: Pakistan make volleyball semis at AVC Nations Volleyball Cup - Sport - DAWN.COM
content:
LAHORE: Pakistan in a superb comeback defeated Indonesia 3-1 in the quarter-final of the the AVC Nations Volleyball Cup in Manama, Bahrain on Saturday.

According to the information released through a press release by the Pakistan Volleyball Federation, Indonesia won the first set 25-20.

However, Pakistan made a brilliant fightback winning the next three sets 25-21, 25-22 and 25-17 to confirm a place in the last four.

Murad Jehan, Usman Faryad and Fahad Raza performed exceptionally for Pakistan in the match.

Published in Dawn, June 22nd, 2025
